org.youscope.common.job

Interface JobContainer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    AutoFocusJob, CellDetectionJob, CompositeJob, ControllerJob, CustomJob, DropletMicrofluidicJob, EditableJobContainer, LiveModifiableJob, MeasurementTask, PlateScanningJob, RepeatJob, ScriptingJob, SlimJob, StaggeringJob, StatisticsJob, WaitJob
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    EditableJobContainerAdapter

    public interface JobContainer
extends java.rmi.Remote
    A job container is any measurement component which contains jobs.
    Author:
    Moritz Lang

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Job getJob(int jobIndex)
      Returns the job at the given index in this container.
      Job[] getJobs()
      Returns a list of all jobs contained in this container.
      int getNumJobs()
      Returns the number of jobs in this container.

    • Method Detail

      • getJobs

        Job[] getJobs()
       throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Returns a list of all jobs contained in this container.
        Returns:
        List of jobs.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • getNumJobs

        int getNumJobs()
        throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Returns the number of jobs in this container.
        Returns:
        number of jobs in this container.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • getJob

        Job getJob(int jobIndex)
    throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
           java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException
        Returns the job at the given index in this container.
        Parameters:
        jobIndex - Index of job in the container.
        Returns:
        the job at the given index.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - Thrown if jobIndex is smaller than zero, or greater or equal to getNumJobs().
